data.text: @djnickosborne Nope! Putting it off at the moment. I’m not anti-vaccines at all but I’m not going to pass out every 6 months while they figure it out 😂
@DanielMKCarter Yeah I know mate. Have you had your second yet?

@djnickosborne Also read today that you’ll need a booster within 6 months and another for any new variants.. I’m starting to get the impression they’ve not got a scooby and are just going to jab, jab and jab and hope it goes away..
